summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RCA Reviewer Google Docs Add-on web app. Backend API structure is correct but blocked by OpenAI quota issue. Frontend UI loads and functions properly with Google-themed design. Main workflows work except for AI integration due to API quota exceeded errors.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 with OpenAI quota exceeded error (429 from OpenAI API)
critical_bugs.impact: Completely blocks RCA analysis functionality - core feature unusable

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 with OpenAI quota exceeded error (429 from OpenAI API)
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks Global RCA Chat feature - key feature unusable

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 with OpenAI quota exceeded error (429 from OpenAI API)
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks comment thread functionality - secondary feature unusable

working_endpoints.status: Working correctly - returns 200 with proper status
working_endpoints.validation: Input validation working for empty documents and messages

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied causing webpack overlay blocking all interactions
ui_bugs.workaround: Users can manually copy code, but overlay prevents navigation

working_features.flow: Navigation between Live Preview and Installation Guide
working_features.status: Working correctly with proper Google-themed design

working_features.flow: Document area with RCA and RCA Review tabs
working_features.status: Tab switching works, proper empty states shown
Editable textarea loads with 1393 characters of sample RCA
Idle → Progress → Idle states work correctly, handles API errors gracefully
Content expansion works with 265 characters of help text
File tab switching works between Code.gs, DocumentService.gs, CommentService.gs, ApiService.gs, appsscript.json

passed_tests: Frontend loads with Google-themed design and proper layout
Navigation between Live Preview and Installation Guide
Document tabs (RCA and RCA Review) switching functionality
RCA textarea with sample content editing
Sidebar idle state with Run Review button
Run Review button triggers progress state correctly
API error handling returns sidebar to idle state
RCA Review tab shows proper empty state
Code file switching between 5 different files
Input validation for empty documents (400 error)
Input validation for empty chat messages (400 error)

success_percentage.backend: 33% (2/6 endpoints working - health + validation, but 3 AI endpoints blocked by quota)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (UI fully functional except copy button permission issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: OpenAI API key has exceeded quota. All AI-powered features (RCA analysis, chat, reply processing) are completely blocked with 429 errors. User must provide a valid OpenAI API key with available quota or increase current quota to test core functionality. Also fix clipboard permission issue in InstallGuide copy button.
